channel.title: A little help
channel.description:
Okay well its true i am new at this, and i know some of you snobby coders will flame me, but im working by myself to see if i can do this for myself right now. Im using the Divine source, im using Wamp and i need to know how i can change my user into an admin, I go into Local host then go to myphpadmin and i see my databases, i cant get any further than that, thats why im asking for help. :confused:
okay well i got the admin part i had to change my rank
how do i change exp rates etc.
and an item id list possibly?

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @kingigor55 kingigor55
item.description:
@kingigor55 wrote:

unowned:

im asking for help on how to set up my rsc server, so its RSC Server development and some coders are snobby and think that everyone who sucks deserves to be killed.

You’re completely 100% right on the deserves to be killed part. Now go die.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @extacy extacy
item.description:
@extacy wrote:

Good ridence, don’t bother if you can’t read a simple database. Learn how MySQL and PHP works together, and how functions are carried through. Then come back, and it’ll be easy as pie.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“unowned, post:3, topic:213455”]im asking for help on how to set up my rsc server, so its RSC Server development and some coders are snobby and think that everyone who sucks deserves to be killed.[/quote]no, its not development. you are asking for help, this is not allowed. sorry. reported.
also, we arent snobby we are just sick of rs2 noobs posting in the wrong section/acting like theyre the best coders in the world when they dont even know how to code when all they do is copy and paste, then they come in here and they think theyre awesome, they try setting up an rsc server, give up since theres no tutorials, and go back to rs2.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Google: http://www.google.ee/search?q=define%3A+development&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a

a process in which something passes by degrees to a different stage (especially a more advanced or mature stage); “the development of his ideas took many years”; “the evolution of Greek civilization”; “the slow development of her skill as a writer”

How exactly has this topic made RSC servers better everywhere?

item.description:
@Peter wrote:

First, calling some people snobby won’t help you get any help.

Model/Player.java for changing experience rates, but this topic is in the wrong section. This is RSC Server Development, not a Help-Board on how to set up DivinePK.
